itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Fir Timber
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Mansha Forest, Phoniel's Cabin, and Treant Forest. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Fir Trees.

item.name: Fir Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber.

item.name: Fir Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Fir Timber.

item.name: Calpheon Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 5 Birch Plywood, 5 Cedar Plywood, and 5 Fir Plywood.

item.name: Sturdy Fir Plywood
item.desc:
A processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Plywood Hardener and Fir Plywood. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.
※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.
※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Ship License: Calpheon Ferry
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a <Calpheon Ferry> at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 10, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 105%, Turn: 105%, Braking: 105%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
